definition: one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正进一步开展细胞遗传和育种利用研究。

sentences.english: A thing that we need to celebrate much more than we are doing already.
sentences.chinese: 一样值得我们进一步颂扬的东西。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要进一步增进友谊，加深理解，深化双方合作。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步探讨客观评价大鼠心肌缺血模型的指标。

sentences.english: The prestress method should be developed in the study of the rotor dynamics problems.
sentences.chinese: 预应力法在转子动力学问题的研究中可进一步拓展。

sentences.english: One must learn by doing in stages, and advancing those things that work.
sentences.chinese: 人们必须在实践中学习，再进一步让过程工作的更好。

sentences.english: More experimental deta are needed for the comparison of these two theories .
sentences.chinese: 要比较这两个理论，尚需待进一步的实验。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更进一步地破坏印度教传统的嫁妆。

sentences.english: Further features will be encorporated in the final version.
sentences.chinese: 正式版中还会有进一步改善。

sentences.english: Moreover, for daylong, you should call an ambulance for me.
sentences.chinese: 再进一步，一天，你应该给我叫救护车了。

sentences.english: The results provide empirical foundation for model-building and simulations.
sentences.chinese: 结论为进一步建模仿真提供了实证基础。

sentences.english: Severe cases may progress to confusion and coma.
sentences.chinese: 情况严重的会进一步恶化以致昏迷及神志不清。

sentences.english: To learn English better, we need to tap into the American and Eurpean culture.
sentences.chinese: 要想学好英语，大家需要进一步了解一些欧美文化。

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作为协定受托国，日本国政府将负责接收进一步签名。

sentences.english: Finally, I give back to help others, which cements the knowledge in.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我返回来帮助其他人，进一步巩固我的知识。

sentences.english: Still greater efforts are needed before we can attain our goal .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须百尺竿头，更进一步，才能达到目的。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
